	<div id="hwrecommendsModal" class="reveal-modal small" data-reveal>
        <div class="modal_overflow">
		<div class="myaccount circle"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up fa-flip-horizontal circleicon"></i></div>
		
		<h2>Hostelworld Recommends</h2>

		<p>We love this hostel! It gets our thumbs up for consistently high customer ratings and excellent quality scores.</p>
        </div>
		<a class="close-reveal-modal">×</a>
	</div>	            <div id="compareModal" class="reveal-modal large" data-reveal>
    <div class="modal_overflow">
        <div class="myaccount circle"><i class="fa fa-columns circleicon"></i></div>
        <span class="c_restore"><i class="fa fa-undo"></i> Reset</span>
        <h2>Compare Results</h2>
    </div>
    <a class="close-reveal-modal">×</a>
</div>
            <script type="text/template" id="compareModalTemplate">
    <table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" class="comparetable">
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><h4>Overview</h4></td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < titleInfo.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %> c_propheader">
                    <div class="c_hidecolumn" id="hideProperty_<%= i + 1 %>" rel="<%= titleInfo[i].propertyId %>"><i class="fa fa-times"></i></div>
                    <span class="proptype"><%= translate(titleInfo[i].type) %></span>
                    <h4><%= titleInfo[i].name %></h4>
                </td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Privates From</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < privates.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><% if (privates[i]) { %><%= currencySymbol %> <%= $.currency.round(privates[i], 2, browsingCurrency) %> <% } else { %>N/A<% } %></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Dorms From</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < dorms.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><% if (dorms[i]) { %><%= currencySymbol %> <%= $.currency.round(dorms[i], 2, browsingCurrency) %> <% } else { %>N/A<% } %></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Rating</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < ratingInfo.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><%= WRI.utils.formatRating(ratingInfo[i].rating) %> (<%= ratingInfo[i].numReviews %> Reviews) <%= translate(WRI.utils.ratingWord(ratingInfo[i].rating)) %></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr class="distanceFromMe" style="display:none;">
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Distance from me</td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < distancesFromCityCentre.length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>" id="distanceFromMe_<%= titleInfo[i].propertyId %>"></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol">Distance from city centre</td>
                <% for (var i = 0; i < distancesFromCityCentre.length; i++) { %>
                    <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><%= distancesFromCityCentre[i] %>km</td>
                <% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><h4>Facilities</h4></td>
                <% for (var i = 0; i < dorms.length; i++) { %><td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"> </td><% } %>
            </tr>
        <% for (var facilityCode in allFacilities) { %>
            <tr class="<% if ($.inArray(allFacilities[facilityCode].id, initialFacilities) == -1) { %>not-initial-facility<% } else { %>initial-facility<% } %>">
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><%= allFacilities[facilityCode].title %></td>
            <% for (var i = 0; i < facilities[facilityCode].length; i++) { %>
                <td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"><i class="fa <% if (facilities[facilityCode][i]) { %>fa-check <% } else { %>fa-times <% } %>rounded"></i></td>
            <% } %>
            </tr>
        <% } %>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><a href="" id="c_showFacilities">Show more</a></td>
                <% for (var i = 0; i < dorms.length; i++) { %><td class="c_prop<%= i + 1 %>"> </td><% } %>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td width="20%" class="c_leftcol"><h4>Location</h4></td>
                <td class="c_map" colspan="<%= dorms.length %>">
                    <div id="compareMap" class="mapView"></div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</script>
            <div id="mapOverlay" class="reveal-modal xlarge" data-reveal>
    <a href="" class="close-reveal-modal">close <i class="fa fa-times"></i></a>
    <div id="modalMap"></div>
</div>

    <input type="hidden" id="markerPrice_<%= property.id %>_amount" value="<%= Math.round(property.lowestAveragePricePerNight) %>">
</script>

                            <script type="text/template" id="fabPropertyTemplate">

            [<%= getResizedImagePath(property.mainImage, 20) %>, (small)],
            [<%= getResizedImagePath(property.mainImage, 30) %>, (medium)]" <% } %>
            >
            <% if (property.images.length > 1 && displayMode != 'mapView') { %>
            <a class="defaultArrow fa fa-2x fa-chevron-circle-left" href="#"></a>
            <a class="defaultArrow fa fa-2x fa-chevron-circle-right" href="#"></a>

                <%= translate(property.propertyType) %>

                            <% if (property.numReviews > 0) { %>

                                    <i class="fa fa-comment-o"></i> <%= property.numReviews %>
                                </a>
                            <% } else { %>
                                <span class="hwta-rating-counter">
                                    <i class="fa fa-comment-o"></i> <%= property.numReviews %>
                                </span>
                            <% } %>
                        <% } %>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <% if (typeof property.ratings.propertyReview !== 'undefined') { %>
                    <ul class="hwta-rating-factors clearfix">
                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Location >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                        <li>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-icon hwta-rating-factors-icon-red">
                                <i class="fa fa-map-marker fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
                            </span>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Location, 'LOCATION') %>
                            </span>
                        </li>

                        <% if (property.ratings.propertyReview.Staff >= property.ratings.minPositiveReviewScore) { %>
                        <li>

                                <i class="fa fa-user fa-flip-horizontal rounded"></i>
                            </span>
                            <span class="hwta-rating-factors-label">
                                <%= humanizeRating(property.ratings.propertyReview.Staff, 'STAFF') %>

                            </span>

        <div class="icon_freewifi"><i class="fa fa-wifi"></i> Free WiFi</div>
        <% } %>
        <% if (property.hasFreeBreakfast) { %>
        <div class="icon_freebrekkie"><i class="fa fa-coffee"></i> Free Breakfast</div>
        <% } %>

        <% if (!property.hasFreeWifi && !property.hasFreeBreakfast){ %>
        <div class="facilities_placeholder"></div>
        <% } %>


        <div class="mobileprice hwta-property-link">
            <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.lowestAveragePricePerNight, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
            </a>
        </div>

        <!-- result details -->
        <div class="fabresult-details">
            <p class="show-for-medium-up"><%= property.description %>...
                <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">More...</a>
            </p>
        </div>

        <!-- prices -->

        <div class="fabresult-prices clearfix">

            <ul class="pricing no-bullet">
                <% if (property.minPriceInBrowsingCurrency > 0) { %>
                <% if (showDormPrice) { %>
                <% property.lowestAverageDormPricePerNight = parseFloat(property.lowestAverageDormPricePerNight) %>
                <% if (!isNaN(property.dormPriceInBrowsingCurrency) && property.lowestAverageDormPricePerNight > 0) { %>
                <li class="dormprice clearfix">
                    <span class="price">
                        <a class="dormroom" href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                            <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.lowestAverageDormPricePerNight, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
                        </a>
                    </span>
                    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>"><% if (!isGroupBooking) { %>Dorms From<% } else { %>Dorm Rooms From<% } %></a>
                </li>
                <% } else { %>
                <% } %>
                <% } %>

                <% if (showPrivatePrice) { %>
                <% property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight = parseFloat(property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight) %>
                <% if (!isNaN(property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight) && property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight > 0) { %>
                <li class="singleprice clearfix">
                        <span class="price">
                            <a class="privateroom hwta-property-link" href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                                <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.lowestAveragePrivatePricePerNight, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
                            </a>
                        </span>
                    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>"><% if (!isGroupBooking) { %>Privates From<% } else { %>Private Rooms From<% } %></a>
                </li>
                <% } else { %>
                <% } %>
                <% } %>

                <% if (showMinPrice) { %>
                <li class="dormprice clearfix">
                    <span class="price">
                        <a class="dormroom hwta-property-link" href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">
                            <%= currencySymbol %><%= $.currency.round(property.minPriceInBrowsingCurrency, 2, browsingCurrency) %>
                        </a>
                    </span>
                    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">Prices from</a>
                </li>
                <% } %>

                <% } %>
                <% if (typeof property.minNightsWarning != 'undefined' && property.minNightsWarning) { %>
                <li class="propmessage_pricing">
                    <div class="propertymessages">
                        <span class="dateswarning panel callout hwta-property-stay-rule-violation"><i class="fa fa-info-circle"></i> <%= property.minNightsWarning %></span>
                    </div>
                </li>
                <% } %>
            </ul>

        </div>

        <div class="show-for-medium-up compare">
            <input type="checkbox" id="comparecheckbox<%= property.id %>" class="comparecheckbox"<% if (isComparisonProperty) { %> checked="checked" <% } %>/>
            <label class="show-compare-modal">Compare</label>
        </div>

    </div>


    <a href="<%= property.url %><%= position %>" class="moreinfo button tiny radius hwta-property-link" target="<%= target %>" rel="<%= rel %>">View</a>

    <% if (typeof property.minNightsWarning != 'undefined' && property.minNightsWarning) { %>
    <div class="propmessage_bottom">
        <span class="dateswarning panel callout hwta-property-stay-rule-violation"><i class="fa fa-info-circle"></i> <%= property.minNightsWarning %></span>
    </div>
    <% } %>

    </div>


</script>

                                    <div class="citytext">
        <h2>About Amsterdam</h2>
        <p><p>Amsterdam is not only a must-visit destination for backpackers in Europe, but the perfect place to find a cheap hostel for a long weekend of fun with friends. </br>We have more than 100 hostels to choose from, which you can filter by price, rating and room type to find the perfect place to stay.</p>

<p>Being one of Europe’s most popular places to party, you won’t have any trouble finding hostels with their own bar. Get ready for a night out with a few drinks in the hostel bar, </br>play a few games of pool or table football, and see if you can join forces with other travellers before you take on the town.</p>
 
<p>Hostels in Amsterdam are super clean, convenient and comfortable, which means you’ve got the perfect place to crash after a long night. </br>If you’re lucky there might even be a free breakfast waiting for you (if you get up early enough). Worst case, you can pay a few euros for a full buffet breakfast.</p>

<p>There are a few options for where to stay in Amsterdam. You can opt for the city centre itself, </br>which puts you within walking distance of all the best pubs, restaurants, coffee shops and attractions.</p>

<p>Or, you can stay somewhere in the canal loop for a bit more breathing space. Everything is still walkable but you can escape at the end of the day. </br>If you want to rub shoulders with the locals, then look for a place in Jordaan, De Pijp or the area surrounding Vondelpark.</p>

<p>The most popular attractions for lovers of art and history are the Rijksmuseum, </br>Van Gogh Museum and Anne Frank House. Another obvious choice is the Red Light District, full of sex shops, peep shows and brothels. Also known as De Wallen, </br>it’s actually the oldest part of Amsterdam, boasting a variety of interesting architecture along with some of the city’s most charming canals.</p>

<p>Some cool areas to check out are De Pijp, which is home to Amsterdam’s most popular market, Albert Cuyp Markt. It’s also packed with great places for brunch. </br>Amsterdam Noord is another great option, where you can find arthouse movies, African dance troupes, grime DJs. You can’t go wrong with Jordaan, </br>Oud-West or Westerpark either. Full of cafes, markets, pop-ups and more.</p>

<p>Amsterdam is the perfect place to find an affordable room or cheap hostel bed for your next European adventure. Find out how to spend an <a href="//www.hostelworld.com/blog/unmissable-amsterdam-48-hours/" target="window">unmissable 48 hours in Amsterdam</a>, </br>or check out some of the <a href="//www.hostelworld.com/blog/top-bars-in-amsterdam-your-favourite-amsterdam-bars/" target="window">tops bars</a> and <a href="//www.hostelworld.com/blog/15-things-to-do-for-free-in-amsterdam/" target="window">free things to do</a> in the city, plus a few <a href="//www.hostelworld.com/blog/your-top-tips-for-amsterdam-insider-advice-from-people-whove-been-there/" target="window">insider tips</a> for good measure.</p></p>
    </div>

            <div class="messages">
                <message v-for="(message, id) in messages" :message="message.message" :type="message.type" :id="id" @remove="removeMessage" :key="id"></message>
            </div>

                <div class="password-wrapper">
                    <span class="forminputlabel">Password</span>
                    <input v-model="password" type="password" placeholder="Password" autocomplete="off"/>

                <div class="cta-main-block">
                    <a class="skip-btn" @click="logout" v-show="enableSkipButton">Skip & Continue</a>
                    <button title="" type="submit" rel="no-follow" class="tiny radius s_orange right">Login</button>
                </div>
            </form>
            <span class="login-forgotten" @click="passwordReset">Forgot password?</span>

CHF33.62 Prices from Compare View We have 119 hostels in Amsterdam with an average rating of 7.7 based on 234,083 reviews 119 of 119 properties available in Amsterdam 1 2 3 4 About Amsterdam Amsterdam is not only a must-visit destination for backpackers in Europe, but the perfect place to find a cheap hostel for a long weekend of fun with friends. We have more than 100 hostels to choose from, which you can filter by price, rating and room type to find the perfect place to stay. Being one of Europe’s most popular places to party, you won’t have any trouble finding hostels with their own bar. Get ready for a night out with a few drinks in the hostel bar, play a few games of pool or table football, and see if you can join forces with other travellers before you take on the town. Hostels in Amsterdam are super clean, convenient and comfortable, which means you’ve got the perfect place to crash after a long night. If you’re lucky there might even be a free breakfast waiting for you (if you get up early enough). Worst case, you can pay a few euros for a full buffet breakfast. There are a few options for where to stay in Amsterdam. You can opt for the city centre itself, which puts you within walking distance of all the best pubs, restaurants, coffee shops and attractions. Or, you can stay somewhere in the canal loop for a bit more breathing space. Everything is still walkable but you can escape at the end of the day. If you want to rub shoulders with the locals, then look for a place in Jordaan, De Pijp or the area surrounding Vondelpark. The most popular attractions for lovers of art and history are the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and Anne Frank House. Another obvious choice is the Red Light District, full of sex shops, peep shows and brothels. Also known as De Wallen, it’s actually the oldest part of Amsterdam, boasting a variety of interesting architecture along with some of the city’s most charming canals. Some cool areas to check out are De Pijp, which is home to Amsterdam’s most popular market, Albert Cuyp Markt. It’s also packed with great places for brunch. Amsterdam Noord is another great option, where you can find arthouse movies, African dance troupes, grime DJs. You can’t go wrong with Jordaan, Oud-West or Westerpark either. Full of cafes, markets, pop-ups and more. Amsterdam is the perfect place to find an affordable room or cheap hostel bed for your next European adventure. Find out how to spend an unmissable 48 hours in Amsterdam , or check out some of the tops bars and free things to do in the city, plus a few insider tips for good measure.
